title: Rename JSON Init Parameter
objective: Learn how the JSON initialization parameters are defined and accessed by an app.

exercise.instructions:
Find the 'APP_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH' line and change:
  APP_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH to APP_CMD_PIPE_MAX
  5 to 7

Locate #define APP_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH line and change:
   CFG_APP_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH to CFG_APP_CMD_PIPE_MAX
   APP_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH to APP_CMD_PIPE_MAX

Locate XX(APP_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH,uint32) and change:
 APP_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH to APP_CMD_PIPE_MAX

Locate the CFE_SB_CreatePipe() and change CFG_APP_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH to CFG_APP_CMD_PIPE_MAX.

See the tutorial document for instructions to show how this change took affect.
